description: A federal district judge in eastern Kentucky ordered Rowan Countyâ€™s clerk, Kim Davis, to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples. A three judge appellate panel denied her request for a stay on Wednesday.
title: Appellate Ruling on Issuing Marriage Licenses to Same-Sex Couples
title_page: Appellate Ruling on Issuing Marriage Licenses to Same-Sex Couples - The New York Times
text:
Court Rules Clerk Must Issue Licenses for Same-Sex Marriages
A federal appeals court in Kentucky on Wednesday affirmed a ruling ordering a county clerk who objects to same-sex marriage on religious grounds to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
